title: E-Commerce Specialist – Shopify & Marketplace Optimization (Contract)
job_overview:
???? Job Description:
Overview:
HUM?N is seeking a detail-oriented and tech-savvy E-Commerce Specialist to manage and optimize the backend of our multi-brand online store. This role is ideal for someone with strong Shopify experience, a passion for clean user experiences, and the ability to implement agile updates across platforms.

You’ll be responsible for day-to-day site improvements, product uploads, quality checks, landing page changes, and overall platform upkeep — ensuring the site performs efficiently across Shopify, Amazon, Walmart, and TikTok Shop.

???? Responsibilities:
???? Shopify Management
Upload new products (copy, images, variants, SEO, and tags)

Perform QA on all product and collection pages before launch

Build and update landing pages using existing page builders (e.g., PageFly, GemPages, etc.)

Apply homepage updates (banners, copy, sales)

Manage navigation, filters, search tags, and 404s

Assist with mobile optimization and speed audits

????? Marketplace Coordination
Assist with feed syncing across Amazon, Walmart, and TikTok Shop

Ensure accurate product info and inventory sync on all platforms

Update marketplace listings when SKUs change

?? Technical & UX Improvements
Implement small customizations (sections, layout changes, image swaps)

Coordinate with AI Specialist for site personalization features

Collaborate with the Creative Director for merchandising decisions

????? Site Issue Tracking & Trello Management
Log bugs or issues in Trello with proper status and labels

Prioritize updates based on urgency and impact

Work with the Warehouse Ops team to resolve product data issues

? Qualifications:
2+ years managing Shopify stores (product uploads, themes, apps)

Basic understanding of HTML/CSS (no dev work, but confident in structure)

Familiarity with marketplaces (Amazon, Walmart, TikTok Shop)

Experience with Shopify apps (loyalty, upsell, reviews, landing page builders)

Organized, responsive, and comfortable using tools like Trello and Slack

Bonus: Past experience with Klaviyo, Rebuy, or personalization tools

???? Location: Remote (Must be responsive during business hours EST)
???? Start Date: ASAP
